properties.description: @{workbookKey=LastPassWorkbook; logoFileName=LastPass.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring; templateRelativePath=LastPassWorkbook.json; subtitle=; provider=LastPass}.description
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 1 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule template

properties.description: EmployeeAccountDeleted_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2

This rule will monitor for any employee accounts being deleted.
Deleting an employee account can have a big potential impact as all of the data for that user will be removed.
properties.displayName: Employee account deleted
properties.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s == "Employee Account Deleted" or Action_s == "Remove User From Company"
| extend AccountCustomEntity = Username_s, IPCustomEntity = IP_Address_s

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 1
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 2 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule template

properties.description: FailedSigninDueToMFA_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2

This rule will check if a sign-in failed into LastPass due to MFA.
An incident can indicate the potential brute forcing of a LastPass account. 
The use of MFA is identified by combining the sign-in logs, this rule assumes LastPass is federated to AAD.
properties.displayName: Failed sign-ins into LastPass due to MFA
properties.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s == "Log in"
| join (SigninLogs | where AppDisplayName == "LastPass Enterprise") on $left.IP_Address_s == $right.IPAddress and $left.Username_s == $right.UserPrincipalName
| where ResultType in (50074, 50076)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = Username_s, IPCustomEntity = IP_Address_s

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 2
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 3 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule template

properties.description: HighlySensitivePasswordAccessed_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2

This rule will monitor access to highly sensitive passwords.
Within the Watchlist called 'LastPass' define passwords which are deemed highly sensitive (such as password to a high privileged application).
When an activity is observed against such password, an incident is created.
properties.displayName: Highly Sensitive Password Accessed
properties.query:
let watchlist = (_GetWatchlist("LastPass") | project name);
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Data_s in (watchlist)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = Username_s, IPCustomEntity = IP_Address_s, URLCustomEntity = Data_s

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 3
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 4 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule template

properties.description: TIMapIPEntityToLastPass_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Identifies a match in LastPass table from any IP IOC from TI
properties.displayName: TI map IP entity to LastPass data

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 4
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 5 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule template

properties.description: UnusualVolumeOfPasswordsUpdatedOrRemoved_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2

This rule will check if there is an unnormal activity of sites that are deleted or changed per user.
 The normal amount of actions is calculated based on the previous 14 days of activity. If there is a significant increase, an incident will be created.
properties.displayName: Unusual Volume of Password Updated or Removed
properties.query:
let threshold = toscalar (LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where todatetime(Time_s) >= startofday(ago(14d)) and todatetime(Time_s) < startofday(ago(1d))
| where Action_s == "Site Changed" or Action_s == "Deleted Sites" 
| summarize count() by Username_s, bin(todatetime(Time_s),1d)
| summarize avg(count_), stdev(count_)
| project threshold = avg_count_+stdev_count_*2);
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Username_s != "API"
| where Action_s == "Site Changed" or Action_s == "Deleted Sites" and todatetime(Time_s) >= startofday(ago(1d))
| summarize count() by Username_s, IP_Address_s
| where count_ > ['threshold']
| extend AccountCustomEntity = Username_s, IPCustomEntity = IP_Address_s

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Analytics Rule 5
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query 1 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query template

properties.description: FailedSigninsDueToMFA_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: Failed sign-ins into LastPass due to MFA.
properties.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s == "Log in"
| join (SigninLogs | where AppDisplayName == "LastPass Enterprise") on $left.IP_Address_s == $right.IPAddress and $left.Username_s == $right.UserPrincipalName
| where ResultType in (50074, 50076)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = Username_s, IPCustomEntity = IP_Address_s, TimestampCustomEntity = todatetime(Time_s)

tags.name: description
tags.value: This will check for sign-ins into LastPass which are not confirmed using MFA based on the Sign-in Logs

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query 1
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query 2 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query template

properties.description: LoginIntoLastPassFromUnknownIP_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: Login into LastPass from a previously unknown IP.
properties.query:
let IPs = SigninLogs
  | project IPAddress;
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s != "Reporting"
| where IP_Address_s !in (IPs)
| summarize by IP_Address_s, Username_s, bin(todatetime(Time_s), 1d)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = Username_s, IPCustomEntity = IP_Address_s, TimestampCustomEntity = Time_s

tags.name: description
tags.value: This query will check how many activity there is in LastPass from IPs that are not seen before in the Sign-in Logs

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query 2
Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query 3 with template
properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring Hunting Query template

properties.description: PasswordMoveToSharedFolder_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: Password moved to shared folders
properties.query:
LastPassNativePoller_CL
| where Action_s == "Move to Shared Folder"
| extend AccountCustomEntity = Username_s, IPCustomEntity = IP_Address_s, URLCustomEntity = Data_s, TimestampCustomEntity = todatetime(Time_s)

tags.name: description
tags.value: This query will check for data that is shared in the LastPass environment.

properties.displayName: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring template

properties.description: Lastpass Enterprise Activity Monitoring data connector with template version 2.0.2

connectorUiConfig.title: LastPass Enterprise - Reporting (Polling CCP)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [LastPass Enterprise](https://www.lastpass.com/products/enterprise-password-management-and-sso) connector provides the capability to LastPass reporting (audit) logs into Microsoft Sentinel. The connector provides visibility into logins and activity within LastPass (such as reading and removing passwords).

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

customs.name: LastPass API Key and CID
customs.description: A LastPass API key and CID are required. [See the documentation to learn more about LastPass API](https://support.logmeininc.com/lastpass/help/use-the-lastpass-provisioning-api-lp010068).

instructionSteps.description: Provide the LastPass Provisioning API Key.
instructionSteps.title: Connect LastPass Enterprise to Microsoft Sentinel
